extension.summary: 開眼電影網 正體中文電影資訊
extension.description: AtMovies a free and open movie database in Traditional Chinese. This scraper downloads movie details from AtMovies. Part of the information will be downloaded from IMDB and TMDB. In my experience, the search engine of AtMovies is quite strict. One may find nothing in search result if you misspell a letter in English title. So my suggestion is that users can layout your movies in the form of \ChineseTitle\EnglishTitle.mkv. Thus if you want to do scraper things by this Traditional Chinese scraper, you can search them by directory name. On the other hand, if you want to search them in English websites such as IMDB, you can search them by file name. IMPORTANT: Note that if you can find movie titles but can't download movie detail, please try again at another time because of the connection issue of AtMovie. To fully enable all the functions of this scraper, it is also recommended to set this scraper as the default movie scraper( System->Video->Scrapers ). To obtain information of director, writer and cast, be sure to have IMDB scraper installed.

開眼電影網是一個開放和免費的電影資料庫。這個scraper會從開眼電影網下載電影資訊，部份的資訊會從IMDB和TMDB下載。根據我的經驗，開眼電影網的搜尋引擎似乎比較嚴苛，使用者可能在片名輸入錯了一個字便會找不到影片，因此建議存放影片的命名方式為 \中文電影名\英文電影名.mkv。注意，根據我的經驗，開眼電影網似乎在晚上時間比較難連線，若發生找的到片名但是找不到詳細內容的話，請換個時間試試(如早上)。為了全面發揮本scraper的功能，建議在使用的時候將本scraper設為預設的電影scraper站台(系統設定->影片->網路站台)。如要取得導演、編劇、演員等資訊，請確保也安裝了IMDB的scraper。
